definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: e4 xing4 tong1 huo4 peng2 zhang4

sentences.english: Conclusions Synovial sarcoma of the hypopharynx is a malignant soft-tissue tumor that is seen rarely in the head and neck.
sentences.chinese: 结论喉咽部滑膜肉瘤是头颈部罕见的软组织恶性肿瘤。

sentences.english: ADC values and FA values may be predictive of astrocytic tumor classification.
sentences.chinese: FA值在肿瘤良恶性鉴别中有一定的价值。

sentences.english: It is the most common type of extranodal low-grade B cell lymphoma.
sentences.chinese: 它是结外低度恶性B细胞淋巴瘤中最常见的一型。

sentences.english: The death rate of the cancer of breast, lung, bone and leukemias in Xinjiang resident are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 放射性所致居民受照剂量和居民的恶性肿瘤死亡率等。

sentences.english: Effects of postoperative radiotherapy on 110 cases of malignant salivary gland tumors.
sentences.chinese: 大涎腺恶性肿瘤术后放疗110例疗效分析。

sentences.english: Ovarian cancer is a common gynecologic malignancy that usually can not be detected at early stage.
sentences.chinese: 卵巢恶性肿瘤是妇科常见的肿瘤，早期不易发现。

sentences.english: A static cultivation apparatus for the culture in vitro of Plasmodium falciparum gametocytes is described.
sentences.chinese: 应用自制恒温恒气装置静态培养恶性疟原虫配子体。

sentences.english: It is feasible to use the theory of combining with disease and syndrome to treat aged malignant hematonosis.
sentences.chinese: 从病证结合角度治疗老年恶性血液病具有一定可行性。

sentences.english: Mitoses by themselves are not indicators of malignancy.
sentences.chinese: 核分裂的出现不能说明恶性肿瘤的存在。

sentences.english: Are policy makers ready to do what it takes to break this vicious circle?
sentences.chinese: 决策者们准备采取措施打破这种恶性循环码？

sentences.english: Effects of Kanglaite on cachexia and immune function of the patients with advanced cancer.
sentences.chinese: 康莱特对晚期恶性肿瘤患者恶病质和免疫功能的影响。

sentences.english: She outlined three steps she says will help you neutralize bad mouthing competitors.
sentences.chinese: 她设计了三个步骤，帮助大家缓解恶性竞争的局面。

sentences.english: Lung cancer and malignant mesothelioma are more common with asbestos inhalation and asbestosis.
sentences.chinese: 肺癌和恶性间皮瘤亦和石绵吸入及石绵沉着病有关。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate detection effect of Wondfo Rapid diagnostic cassette for P.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价万孚恶性疟快速检测试剂盒的检测效果。

sentences.english: Objective To research the synergism and attenuation of insulin on chemotherapy of malignant tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究胰岛素对恶性肿瘤化疗的增效减毒作用。

sentences.english: The network and computer systems are confronted to daily attacks by malwares.
sentences.chinese: 在网络时代，我们每天都在受到恶性软件的威胁。

definition: positive (in its effect)/leading to good consequences/virtuous/(medicine) benign (tumor etc)
to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)

(neologism c. 2013) organized disruption of healthcare facilities or verbal and physical abuse of medical staff, by an aggrieved patient or proxies such as family members or hired thugs, typically aimed at obtaining compensation
to happen/to occur/to take place/to break out
to determine the nature (usually of error or crime)/to determine chemical composition/qualitative/fixed
excessively tolerant/to overindulge (sb)/overly conciliatory/to seek appeasement at any price
(of diseases, accidents) to occur with a high incidence/(old) to score highly in the imperial exams
